text2: Effortlessly exchange with complete transparency, security, and convenience. Your journey to financial freedom starts here.
footerDescription: Effortlessly exchange with complete transparency, security, and convenience. Your journey to financial freedom starts here.

features.descriptionTradeWorldwide: Buy and sell local and digital currencies including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Tether, and USDC – across 140 markets with 500+ payment methods.
features.descriptionSendMoneyInstantly: Send cash or cryptocurrency to anyone, anytime – with faster, cheaper, and simpler transactions powered by the blockchain.
features.descriptionAccessTheGlobe: By using Tether Zone, we can overcome local infrastructure limitations.
